title: Times of Our Lives - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Calm Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day
author: Jing Shui Bian   木更木更   静水边
description:
Top student Xie Meng had done badly in the high school entrance examinations, and so enrolled in W High. There, he met Ji Qinyang, a boy with a completely opposite character to him. In the spring of their lives, the two youths gradually fell in love, and both were accepted to universities in the same city. With the experiences of their youth, their dreams, and their realities, the bond between the two people deepened. Eventually, they spent the rest of their lives hand in hand.

That’s the youth I love, that accompanied me through my spring and my prime.>
